member.name: IExplorerBrowserEvents.OnNavigationComplete
member.summary: Notifies clients that the Explorer browser has successfully navigated to a Shell folder.
member.param: A PIDL that specifies the folder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IExplorerBrowserEvents.OnNavigationFailed
member.summary: Notifies clients that the Explorer browser has failed to navigate to a Shell folder.
member.param: A PIDL that specifies the folder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IExplorerBrowserEvents.OnNavigationPending
member.summary: Notifies clients of a pending Explorer browser navigation to a Shell folder.
member.param: A PIDL that specifies the folder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IExplorerBrowserEvents.OnViewCreated
member.summary: Notifies clients that the view of the Explorer browser has been created and can be modified.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IExplorerBrowserEvents
member.summary: Exposes methods for notification of Explorer browser navigation and view creation events.
